articles.title: Phil Spencer apologises for 'disappointing' Redfall and claims Xbox was expecting better reviews | VGC - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: Developer Arkane will continue to work on the game, following poor launch reception…
articles.content:
Xbox boss Phil Spencer has apologised for the launch state of its latest big first-party release, Redfall, and claimed that developer Arkane Austin will work on improvements for the game.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip 5 will have a large 3.4-inch 720p cover display, leak claims - The Verge
articles.description: A leaker says Samsung’s upcoming Z Flip 5 will have a 3.4-inch cover screen with a resolution of 720 x 748. It’s a big increase over the 1.9-inch cover display on the Z Flip 4.

articles.title: Don't Miss: Eta Aquariid Meteor Shower Outburst Peak – Up to 160 Meteors per Hour - SciTechDaily

articles.content:
